sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { FaListAlt, FaCheckSquare, FaPlusSquare, FaTrash } from "react-icons/fa";
import { NavLink, useLocation } from "react-router-dom";

const NavBar = ({ onClearCompleted }) => {
  const location = useLocation();

  // Pour forcer le focus du bouton selon l'URL, même sur /active
  return (
    <footer
      className="d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center bg-white border-top shadow-lg fixed-bottom p-3"
      id="mainfooter"
      style={{ gap: "24px", zIndex: 1050 }}
    >
      <nav className="d-flex" style={{ gap: "10px" }}>
        <NavLink
          to="/"
          className={({ isActive }) =>
            "btn px-4 py-2 fw-semibold " +
            ((isActive || location.pathname === "/active") ? "btn-primary text-white" : "btn-outline-primary")
          }
          title="Toutes les tâches"
          end
        >
          <FaListAlt />
        </NavLink>
        <NavLink
          to="/completed"
          className={({ isActive }) =>
            "btn px-4 py-2 fw-semibold " +
            (isActive ? "btn-success text-white" : "btn-outline-success")
          }
          title="Terminées"
        >
          <FaCheckSquare />
        </NavLink>
        <NavLink
          to="/add-task"
          className={({ isActive }) =>
            "btn px-4 py-2 fw-semibold " +
            (isActive ? "btn-warning text-white" : "btn-outline-warning")
          }
          title="Ajouter une tâche"
        >
          <FaPlusSquare />
        </NavLink>
      </nav>
      <button
        className="btn btn-outline-danger px-4 py-2 fw-semibold ms-2"
        title="Supprimer les tâches terminées"
        onClick={onClearCompleted}
        type="button"
      >
        <FaTrash />
      </button>
    </footer>
  );
};

export default NavBar;
